symbols.docstring: Systematic audit of what to REMOVE. Research minimalist landing page patterns, identify every element that doesn't directly support free trial convers
symbols.name: Goal

symbols.docstring: Phase 18 audit was biased toward "what to add" not "what to remove". User instincts caught several cuts: - About section (redundant) - All Access $400
symbols.name: Why This Phase

symbols.docstring: - Minimalist landing page case studies - "Above the fold only" conversion patterns - What high-converting pages DON'T have - Cognitive load reduction
symbols.name: Research Areas

symbols.docstring: - Every remaining element justified against conversion goal - Page scroll depth reduced - Cognitive load minimized - No "nice to have" content - only
